content: a pair of cashmerino chunky slippers makes a luxurious and beautiful gift for someone you love - knitted flat these slippers work up in a wink and are the perfect speedy knit garter stitch keeps all that gorgeous warmth in with a deep ribbed cuff to fold over at the ankle **sizes** to fit uk shoe size 4-5 6-7 **materials** debbie bliss is exclusively available at lovecrafts com 50g/1¾oz balls of debbie bliss cashmerino chunky 2 3 balls in pearl 23 a 1 2 balls in rose 22 b pair of 5 5mm us 9 needles pair of 6mm us 10 needles **gauge** 15 sts and 30 row to 10cm/4in garter st using 5 5mm us 9 needles
